headline.main: India Batting Coach Urges Rahul to Be More Responsible
headline.print_headline: India Batting Coach Urges Rahul to Be More Responsible

lead_paragraph: India opener Lokesh Rahul must improve his temperament and put a bigger price on his wicket, the team's batting coach Sanjay Bangar said on Monday.
snippet: India opener Lokesh Rahul must improve his temperament and put a bigger price on his wicket, the team's batting coach Sanjay Bangar said on Monday....
